Hydras:

Hydras frowned and he without mercy trow awayTucson and started to=

 he Stoped and using his hydra's heads he araised Tucson and trow him in a =
way that he landed at Scourge's feet and said "You are Right Zarak, we shou=

l have time to kill him later... before yourself have your sport; I have a =

ct every piece of useful information from him... I want a report when you f=

"Ahem, u=
m LORD Hydras" Zarak's voice came over the Dark Tower speakers, his voice s=
tumbling over over the word 'lord' and for a moment sounding vaguely sardon=
ic before he continued. "While you have been um . . . dealing with our intr=
uder I have been keeping watch over the scanners."

There is a slight pause=
 as one of the ceiling mounted scanners orients on Tuscon, "He does indeed =
have features that resemble Prime." Zarak's voice speaks again, "Before you=
 kill him, he might be useful to us." Zarak's dark chuckle rolls through th=
e room, "After all. If not, he can still be put to death."

Preston
(Tempin=
g Zarak/Scorponok)
